FuncDef: This command is used to match BGP flow-spec routes on the basis of the source IP prefix in the flow specification. An IPv4 flow-spec route is matched by this command if its NLRI contains a type 2 subcomponent encoding a prefix and prefix-length that is covered by an entry in the referenced prefix-list. An IPv6 flow-spec route is matched by this command if its NLRI contains a type 2 component encoding prefix-offset=0 and a prefix & prefix-length that is covered by an entry in the referenced prefix-list.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of a prefix-list containing IPv4 and/or IPv6 prefix entries, up to 32 characters.
